import React, { Fragment, userState } from "react"; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = userState({ name: "", email: "", password: "", password2: "", }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return (
